Rating: R (Language Throughout|Graphic Nudity|Some Crude Sexual Material|Violence)
Synopsis: Best friends Audrey and Morgan are going about their humdrum lives in Los Angeles -- until Audrey's ex-boyfriend suddenly shows up with a team of deadly assassins on his trail. Unexpectedly thrust into an international conspiracy, the gals soon find themselves dodging killers and a suspicious British agent while hatching a plan to save the world.
Title: The Spy Who Dumped Me
